Course Description: THIS COURSE COVERS RECORDING OF SPECIFIC TRANSACTIONS AND INTERNAL CONTROL ASSOCIATED WITH INVESTMENTS, FIXED ASSETS, LIABILITIES INTERNATIONAL OPERATIONS AND STOCKHOLDERS EQUITY.  PREPARATION OF THE STATEMENT OF CASH FLOW WILL BE EMPHASIZED.  THE CODE OF PROFESSIONAL ETHICS WILL BE HIGHLIGHTED THROUGHOUT THE COURSE
Textbook(s): HORNGREN.  ACCOUNTING.  PUBLISHER:  PRENTICE HALL.  (PACKAGE INCLUDES 24-MONTH ACCESS TO MY ACCOUNTING LAB AND A PRINTED STUDY GUIDE.)
Transfer Status: GUARANTEED TRANSFER TO INSTITUTION OFFERING SAME COURSE.
